labels.label: Save the files to an intake folder
If data file is AES encrypted (has a passphrase), decrypt it
When summary reports are approved (by moving them into the approved reports folder, send an email to stakeholders
Generate the summary report. Save a copy in the intake folder and notify stakeholders that report is ready for review.
If the data file is GPG encrypted, decrypt it

entry.value: Unable to decrypt datafile using passphrase.
